Assassins.description:
(2) @Scathe 50% chance to apply @Poison 
 (4) Each stack of @Poison decreases @attack by 1 
 (6) @Poison tick applies @Vulnerability

Archers.description:
(3) @Scathe: 30% to @Bonus Shot 
 (6) @Bonus Shot damage is doubled

PlagueSpreaders.description:
(2) @Plague heals allies for 0.5 after dealing damage to them 
 (4) Apply @Vulnerability x2 when enemy gains @Plague  
 (6) Enemies with @Plague gain @Deathrattle: apply @Plague to random ally

Warlocks.description:
(2) @Scathe: apply @Siphon Life if target doesnâ€™t have it 
 (4) @Siphon Life damage is doubled 
 (6) @Siphon Life damages one more random enemy

Freezers.description:
(2) @Frozen enemies have @Vulnerability 
 (4) @Injured: apply @Freeze to attacker 
 (6) Enemies in @Freeze take 1 damage every tick

Dragons.description:
(1) All @Dragons have @Fire attack 
 (2) @Burn damage applies @Vulnerability  (4) @Flaming Breath always applies @Burn (6) All @Dragons gain @Rebirth

Protectors.description:
(2) On attack 25% chance to gain @Shield 
 (4) On @Injured 25% chance to gain @Shield (6) @Shield has 2 charges

Vampires.description:
(2) +20% @Vampirism to all allies 
 (4) @Vampirism can heal 40% past @max_hp 
 (6) +3 @max_hp on kill

Demons.description:
(1) All @Demons have 15% chance to @Dark Steal on Melee or Ranged @Scathe 
 (3) @Dark Steal applies @Vulnerability  
 (6) @Dark Steal heals for sum of stolen stats
